name: drive-organizer
description: Google Drive Organizer - AI-powered file organization

scripts.setup: pnpm install && cd apps/api && poetry install
scripts.lint: pnpm lint:web && cd apps/api && poetry run ruff .
scripts.test: pnpm test:web && cd apps/api && poetry run pytest
scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && poetry run uvicorn main:app --reload --port 3030
